title: Sem 3 CSE difficulty
content: How hard is sem 3 CSE subjects for someone who is interested in CS? Is the jump from first year to second year a lot?.  For context I got 8.7 cgpa in first year.

comments.body: It's not difficult but the teacher will make it. Read the text books from the start of the semester and it'll be the most interesting year ever

The recommended textbooks. At the start of the semester, you get a document titled 'course plan' or something along those lines. It tells you which section of the course is taken from which section in what textbook. Some courses have one textbook, some have multiple. You'll find free pdfs online for these textbooks or if you prefer, you can get a hard copy from the library
Can we borrow it from library for a few weeks and take it home?
Yeah u can, and u can renew too and take it for another 15 days or sum, u can do this for the whole sem

Adding to this: Not sure if it still happens but the campus mart used to sell photocopies of these books at cheap rates and at the end of the semester they used to buy back these copies. Many students who preferred a hard copy but did not want to invest in the book used to opt for these.
